>>43128123
THIS BASES

The summary for anyone wondering about this company.
>Akira is the CEO of Wactor, aka Meido / Maid
>Wactor has a deep history of being a black company
>Multiple talents have left the company in bad terms
>Akira is half Chilean half Japanese, born in Japan, so he speak a little spanish, really broken spanish
>His chilhood friend is Miu, the oldest talent in the company and started the company with him
>His real mother (Chilean) is part of the management and the only manager beside Akira (lol)
>Lia the second oldest talent in the company and is the current girlfriend or sex toy of the CEO
>The modus operandi of the company is hire girls from third world countries, with really bad contracts and with stupid clauses like "if you don't stream 3 time a week you get a fine of 50,000 Yen" or "if you break contract and don't stream for two years you get a fine of 500,000 yen" all of this is bullshit and empty legislation threats
Now you may say that isn't too bad, but
>Akira retain the payment of the talents, and then threat them when they demand their payment
>One of the worst publicly know cases is Laila (now Eileennoir)
>She used to be one of the talents that earned the most money
>Akira didn't pay her for 3 months, Laila complained and then suspended her for 2 months for complaining
>Laila got pissed and started to complain in her roommate account (Eileenor)
>Akira decide to suspend her indefinitely because of that
>at the same time Rose and Hana other wactor talents at the time had problem with the company
>Rose had serious problems with being bullied by Lia
>all her complaint were ignored because Lia is Akira's gf
>Hana had money problem, because Akira retained her payments
>All three of them decide too quit the company
>Laila decide to get a lawyer
>Akira in response threat her with a lawsuit and Doxx her with her real name
>All 3 of them are indies now and doing much better
>fast forward to now
>Luna, Misora, and the new ES talent complain about the impartiality of Akira, expending all the money that they earn on talent that don't earn money like Lia and Miu, examples like solo 3D concerts for them and multiple 2D outfits and 3D models for them
>Things get really bad and they get shadow banned
>Fans start to complain, because they are the most popular vtubers in the agency
>Akira just said that they are either on break for health issues or in vacations
>Now everyone know he was lying and the company is getting flamed not only by the ES viewers but also by the JP viewers
At the moment there a few talents still on the company because they don't want to break their contracts and being black listed by any other company, like the case of the new ES girls or the only boy unit in the company. 
We can only hope that they company shut down and they get free of any contract, because right now they are slaves to the company.
>TLDR
Akira is a scammer, her mom and Miu are on it for the money, Lia is a menhera and get more exposure and power in trade for sexual favors, the rest of the talents are being taken advantage
